indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_jobs_remote_async ON public.jobs USING btree (remote, async_possible, sensitive_data_risk)
indexes.name: idx_jobs_remote_async

indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_jobs_seen ON public.jobs USING btree (COALESCE(last_seen_at, listed_at))
indexes.name: idx_jobs_seen

indexes.def: CREATE INDEX idx_jobs_status ON public.jobs USING btree (status)
indexes.name: idx_jobs_status

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_board_external_unique ON public.jobs USING btree (board, external_id)
indexes.name: jobs_board_external_unique

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_board_extid_uniq ON public.jobs USING btree (board, external_id) WHERE ((board IS NOT NULL) AND (external_id IS NOT NULL))
indexes.name: jobs_board_extid_uniq

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_fingerprint_uniq ON public.jobs USING btree (fingerprint_hash) WHERE (fingerprint_hash IS NOT NULL)
indexes.name: jobs_fingerprint_uniq

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_fingerprint_unique ON public.jobs USING btree (fingerprint_hash)
indexes.name: jobs_fingerprint_unique

indexes.def: CREATE INDEX jobs_last_seen_idx ON public.jobs USING btree (last_seen_at DESC)
indexes.name: jobs_last_seen_idx

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_pkey ON public.jobs USING btree (id)
indexes.name: jobs_pkey

indexes.def: CREATE INDEX jobs_status_fit_listed_idx ON public.jobs USING btree (status, automation_fit DESC, listed_at DESC, last_seen_at DESC)
indexes.name: jobs_status_fit_listed_idx

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_url_uniq ON public.jobs USING btree (url) WHERE (url IS NOT NULL)
indexes.name: jobs_url_uniq

indexes.def: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX jobs_url_unique ON public.jobs USING btree (url)
indexes.name: jobs_url_unique
